actions.name: Create PR
actions.prompt: copy GOAL.md into GOALS/ following the instructions from README.md; store the git path (by querying jj) into GIT_DIR, and using GH, make a draft PR for the commit at @ (jj); CRITICAL: commit message, the PR title and body, must adhere to the standard of previous commits - update all of these if necessary; once you are done, using bash(`open`), open the PR for me.
actions.description: Create a draft pull request from current changes

actions.name: Upstream Sync
actions.prompt: `jj git fetch --all-remotes`; rebase against main@origin (`jj rebase -d main@origin`), fix merge conflicts, and push
actions.description: Fetch and rebase against upstream main branch

actions.name: Start Application
actions.prompt: start the application server and ensure it is running properly; use the instructions inside `.deploy/` if available; if this is a networked application, and it starts at localhost, use 'localhost:0' to randomize the application start.
